name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Beat the crap out of the mixture…
Sift and add flour, baking soda, salt
Mix until uniform consistency, but do not over mix
Bake for 11 minutes until edges start to brown

additional_context.source: Lani (who is Dr. Dan's mom). Dr. Dan is Isaac's dad's friend growing up and would often attend family holidays when Isaac was growing up.
additional_context.tips: The flour amount used to be 1 1/2 cup of flour but we found that adding more flour makes the cookies less flat and more chewy.
